mapper.update:
UPDATE blog_article
content = #{content},
title = #{title},
isPrivate = #{isPrivate},
pubDate = #{pubDate},
summary = #{summary},
art_level = #{level}, art_lock = #{lockId},
art_status = #{status,javaType=ArticleStatus,typeHandler=EnumOrdinalTypeHandler},
art_from = #{from,javaType=ArticleFrom,typeHandler=EnumOrdinalTypeHandler},
space_id = #{space.id},
allowComment = #{allowComment},
lastModifyDate = #{lastModifyDate},
feature_image = #{featureImage}, art_alias = #{alias}
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT art.id AS art_id, art.pubDate, art.lastModifyDate, art.title, art.isPrivate, art.hits, art.summary, art.art_level, art.art_status, art.art_from, art.space_id, art.art_lock, art.art_alias, art.feature_image, sp.space_alias, space_lock, sp.space_name, sp.is_private AS space_is_private, GROUP_CONCAT(bt.tag_name) AS tags FROM blog_article art LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_space sp ON art.space_id = sp.id LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_article_tag bat ON bat.article_id = art.id LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_tag bt ON bat.tag_id = bt.id WHERE art.id IN #{id} GROUP BY art.id

SELECT art.id AS art_id, art.art_alias, art.title, art.hits, art.pubDate, art.lastModifyDate, sp.space_alias,
art.isPrivate, art.art_lock, space_lock, sp.is_private AS space_is_private
FROM blog_article art LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_space sp ON art.space_id = sp.id WHERE art.art_status = 0
AND space_id = #{space.id}
AND art.isPrivate = false AND sp.is_private = false
WHERE art.art_status = 1 AND art.pubDate <= #{date} GROUP BY art.id
mapper.update: UPDATE blog_article SET hits = hits + #{hits} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT hits FROM blog_article WHERE id = #{id}
GROUP BY art.id

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(hits),0) AS totalHits, COUNT(art.id) AS totalArticles, MAX(lastModifyDate) AS lastModifyDate, MAX(pubDate) AS lastPubDate FROM blog_article art LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_space sp ON art.space_id = sp.id
art.space_id = #{space.id}
mapper.update: UPDATE blog_article SET art_lock = NULL WHERE art_lock = #{lockId}
mapper.select: SELECT MIN(pubDate) FROM blog_article WHERE art_status = 1
SELECT id FROM blog_article WHERE art_alias = #{alias}

SELECT art.id AS art_id, art.art_alias, art.title, art.space_id, art.feature_image, sp.space_alias, sp.space_name FROM blog_article art LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_space sp ON art.space_id = sp.id WHERE art.art_status = 0
AND art.isPrivate = false AND sp.is_private = false
AND art.art_lock IS NULL AND sp.space_lock IS NULL
ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 0,1

mapper.update: UPDATE blog_article SET space_id = #{newSpace.id} WHERE space_id = #{oldSpace.id}

SELECT space_id,space_alias,space_name,COUNT(*) AS art_count FROM blog_article art LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_space sp ON art.space_id = sp.id WHERE art_status = 0
AND art.isPrivate = false AND sp.is_private = false
